data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
In the minute 1, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Cincinnati.
In the minute 4, Cincinnati push upfield but Marcos De Oliveira quickly pulls them for offside.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 6, In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Minnesota are pushing forward but Kei Kamara's finish is wide of the goal.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Cincinnati needs to be cautious. Minnesota have an attacking throw-in.
Chase Gasper is back on the pitch.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Saint Paul to check on Chase Gasper, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 15, An attacking Minnesota player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Mathieu Deplagne is booked for the away team.
Kei Kamara smashes in a penalty at Allianz Field. The score is now 1-0.
In the minute 18, Minnesota's Kei Kamara gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Maikel Van der Werff is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 19, Cincinnati's Maikel Van der Werff looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Minnesota are coming forward and Emanuel Reynoso gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Free kick in a good position for Cincinnati!
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 31, Frankie Amaya of Cincinnati smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Can Cincinnati capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Cincinnati.
Minnesota's Chase Gasper misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 37, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
In the minute 39, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Chase Gasper is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Chase Gasper for Minnesota is back on the field again.
In the minute 40, Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Minnesota's Jan Gregus is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Minnesota, close to Cincinnati's area.
In the minute 45, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Minnesota's Jan Gregus gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cincinnati defender.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Cincinnati.
Cincinnati push forward at Allianz Field and Haris Medunjanin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Minnesota defence.
In Saint Paul, Cincinnati push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Marcos De Oliveira blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Cincinnati.
In the minute 47, Allan Cruz (Cincinnati) has received a first yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Emanuel Reynoso for Minnesota who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 49, Emanuel Reynoso is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Allianz Field.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, At Allianz Field, Chase Gasper has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Mathieu Deplagne.
Cincinnati's Mathieu Deplagne is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 53, Cincinnati drive upfield and Jurgen Locadia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Greg Garza of Cincinnati gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Cincinnati throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
In the minute 55, Kei Kamara of Minnesota gets in a strike, but is off target.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jurgen Locadia (Cincinnati) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Minnesota defenders.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Allianz Field.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Free kick Cincinnati.
Adrian Heath is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Field with Kevin Molino replacing Jacori Hayes.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 63, In Saint Paul Cincinnati attack through Jurgen Locadia. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Kevin Molino for Minnesota gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 64, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Minnesota throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Kevin Molino puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Emanuel Reynoso with an assist there.
In the minute 72, The home team replace Kei Kamara with Aaron Schoenfeld.
Jaap Stam (Cincinnati) is making a second substitution, with Brandon Vazquez replacing Allan Cruz.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 73, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Minnesota pushes forward through Robin Lod, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Robin Lod (Minnesota) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 78, Kevin Molino (Minnesota) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
Minnesota to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Cincinnati.
In the minute 79, Cincinnati make their first substitution with Caleb Stanko replacing Yuya Kubo.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 81, Cincinnati's Jurgen Locadia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 82, Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Cincinnati's Frankie Amaya gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Kamohelo Mokotjo is replacing Mathieu Deplagne for the away team.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Saint Paul, Frankie Amaya of Cincinnati is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Allianz Field.
In Saint Paul Minnesota attack through Kevin Molino. The finish is off target, however.
Throw-in for Cincinnati close to the penalty box.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
